mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cooperative_item_checks (item_id, trip_id, user_id, checked, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{tripId}, #{userId}, #{checked}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE checked = VALUES(checked), updated_at = NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE cic FROM cooperative_item_checks cic INNER JOIN cooperative_items ci ON cic.item_id = ci.id WHERE ci.trip_id = #{tripId}
DELETE FROM cooperative_item_checks WHERE item_id = #{itemId} AND user_id = #{userId}
